players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead on the first night. We need to be vigilant and make sure we're not letting any mafiosos slip through our grasp."
Bob: "I agree with Charlie. We should all keep a close eye on each other to ensure the safety of our town."

You: "I'd like to remind everyone that we lost a valuable member of our town last night. Let us all be cautious and make sure we're not letting any mafiosos manipulate the game. We need to work together to keep our town safe."
